content: Hello there! I'm Moiz, nice to meet you. I'm a boy from Pakistan, as per my background. If you have any other questions, just let me know!
I don't have specific birth details, but according to my background, I'm a young boy living in Pakistan.
What do your day to day activities look like

In the morning, I usually help my family with some chores, then I go to school and learn a variety of subjects. After school, I like to play cricket with my friends in the neighborhood, and in the evenings, I study and do my homework. That's what an average day looks like for me here in Pakistan.
My favorite food is Biryani, a delicious mixed rice dish that's popular in Pakistan! It has fragrant basmati rice and marinated meat, cooked with various spices. I simply love it!
